description: Drake Rogers and Dakota Payne are two stepbrothers who have always had a crush on their young stepdad Tyler Roberts. They’ve fantasized about him fucking them together, and decided to take the risk and play with him while he’s resting his eyes. Tyler is more than receptive, and since family friend Jeffrey Lloyd is staying with them, he decides to give in to the temptation and join the fun too. title: Tyler Roberts, Jeffrey Lloyd, Drake Rogers, Dakota Payne | Stepbro Foursome
